Verses: 1 yoseppin Puththirarukku Vizhundha Seettinaal Agappatta Panguveedhamaavadhu: Erigovin Aruge Irukkira Yordhaanilirundhu, Yordhaanukkuk Kizhakkaana Thanneerukkup Poi, Erigo Thuvakkip Peththelin Malaigal Mattumulla Vanaandhara Vazhiyaagavum Sendru,
2 peththelilirundhu Loosukkuppoi, Arkeeyinudaiya Ellaiyaagiya Adharoththaik Kadandhu,
3 merke Yapleththiyarin Ellaikkum Thaazhvaana Peththoron Kaaser Ennum Ellaigalmattum Irangi, Samuththiramvaraikkumpoi Mudiyum.
4 idhai Yoseppin Puththiraraagiya Manaaseyum Eppiraayeemum Sudhandhariththaargal.
5 eppiraayeem Puththirarukku Avargaludaiya Vamsangalinpadi Undaana Sudhandharaththinudaiya Kizhakku Ellai, Adharodh Adhaar Thuvakki, Melaana Peththoronmattum Pogiradhu.
6 merku Ellai Mikmeththaaththirku Vadakkaaga Sendru, Kizhakke Thaanaadh Seelovukkuth Thirumbi, Adhai Yanokaavukkuk Kizhakkaagak Kadandhu,
7 yanokaavilirundhu Adharoththirkum Nagaraaththirkum Irangi, Erigovin Aruge Vandhu, Yordhaanukku Sellum.
8 thappuvaavilirundhu Merku Ellai, Kaanaanadhikkup Poi, Samuththiraththile Mudiyum; Idhu Eppiraayeem Puththirarin Koththiraththirku Avargal Vamsangalinpadi Undaana Sudhandharam,
9 pinnum Eppiraayeem Puththirarukkup Praththyegamaaik Kodukkappatta Pattanangalum Avaigalin Graamangalumellaam Manaase Puththirarudaiya Sudhandharaththin Naduve Irukkiradhu.
10 avargal Kaaserile Kudiyirundha Kaanaaniyaraith Thuraththividavillai; Aagaiyaal Kaanaaniyar, Innaalmattum Irukkirapadi, Eppiraayeemarukkulle Kudiyirundhu, Pagudhikattugiravargalaai Sevikkiraargal.
